entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
